tool_description: Creates audience segments based on demographic characteristics, behaviors, and engagement patterns for targeted analysis.

max_segments.description: Maximum number of segments to create (2-20)

include_micro_segments.description: Whether to create micro-segments for niche audiences

error_messages: Insufficient audience data: Minimum 50 audience members required for segmentation
Invalid segmentation criteria: Specified criteria are not available in audience data
Segment size too small: segment_size_threshold must be at least 10
Invalid max segments: Value must be between 2 and 20
Invalid overlap tolerance: Value must be between 0 and 0.5
Segmentation failed: Unable to create meaningful segments with current criteria
usage: Provide audience_data and segmentation_criteria arrays. Adjust segment_size_threshold, max_segments, overlap_tolerance, and micro-segment inclusion as needed for optimal segmentation.

segments_created.description: Total number of segments successfully created

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of audience covered by all segments
